title: Jeremy Corbyn
summary: Jeremy Bernard Corbyn (/ˈkɔːrbɪn/; born 26 May 1949) is a British politician who served as Leader of the Labour Party and Leader of the Opposition from 2015 to 2020. A Member of Parliament (MP) for Islington North since 1983,[1] Corbyn is on the political left of the Labour Party and identifies as a socialist.[2][3]
